subject: FINE
title: Design and Imaging
description: In this course students will explore the fundamentals of design through a series of exercises and assignments that cultivate artistic expression and technical skill. Through an exploration of both analogue and digital processes, students will learn to apply the principles of aesthetic design to a variety of contexts, including two-dimensional space, three-dimensional form, and digital frameworks. [Note: Studio course. Previous experience with digital imaging software is useful.]
